nodes.text: Lenstrum Market was an old market located in the Upper Industrial Sector on Nar Shaddaa. During the Cold War a deal was being conducted in the market between arms dealers and Republic Strategic Information Service operatives, which was interrupted by Imperials hired by Factor Jarvus.
Lenstrum Market appear as an area on Nar Shaddaa in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
